title: Hi there!
text:
I am an economist and data scientist at the health services management of one of the largest health insurance companies in Switzerland. By training, I am an economist and philosopher.
My passion lies in R programming and expressing quantitative information using numbers, simulations, models and great visualizations. When not coding or writing, you‚Äôll find me running or bikingüö¥üòé, doing politics with the Green liberal party, cooking, and collaborating on the Intergifted project with my wife Jennifer.
Feel free to contact me using my contact informations üëá

     LinkedIn
  
  
    
     Email
